comments: He\'s great! His teaching style is wonderful and he gives real life examples. His grading is way chill, you could draw a picture on the test and he\'ll give you points for trying. He gives the short answer questions a week in advance for tests. The group project is a joke and an easy A. Try your best to get him for Principles of Marketing.
legit the most chill teacher ever.
awesome teacher, the test is basically given to you before hand if you just learn the information he gives you and try its a guaranteed A
good teacher, very easy class. he grades just on test pretty much and has one easy group project. I recomend this guy.
